primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
Earn Rewards While You Hold

Crypto staking allows you to earn passive income by supporting blockchain networks that use a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) mechanism. When you stake your crypto with NDAX, you contribute to network security and receive staking rewardsâ€”up to 12% APY, depending on the asset.

NDAX currently supports staking for 13 assets, including:

  • Ethereum (ETH)
  • Cardano (ADA)
  • Polkadot (DOT)
  • Polygon (MATIC)
  • The Graph (GRT)
  • Cosmos (ATOM)
  • Tezos (XTZ)
  • NEAR Protocol (NEAR)
  • Solana (SOL)
  • Avalanche (AVAX)
  • Mina (MINA)
  • Internet Computer (ICP)
  • Flow (FLOW)

Want to learn more about staking? Visit our Help Article here:
https://ndax.io/en/support/staking
